All Implemented Interfaces:
HasCloseHandlers<PopupPanel>, HasHandlers, EventListener, EventPreview, HasAnimation, HasWidgets, SourcesPopupEvents, Iterable<Widget>
public class InfoPopup
extends PopupPanel

Displays a popup informational message.

Constructor Detail

InfoPopup

public InfoPopup(String message)
Creates an info popup with the supplied message. It will automatically dismiss itself after a time proportional to the length of the message has elapsed.

InfoPopup

public InfoPopup(Widget contents)
Creates an info popup with the supplied contents.

Method Detail

computeAutoClearDelay

public static int computeAutoClearDelay(String message)
Computes a reasonable delay after which it should be safe to automatically clear a transient informational message.

toError

public InfoPopup toError()
Converts this info popup into an error popup (via a CSS style change) and returns self.

Displays this info popup directly below the specified widget.

Displays this info popup in the center of the page.
